category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_disallow_release_status_on_replica
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether replicas are allowed to be released (have a release status). If you are using Global Change Management, you must set this preference value to false to allow application of release status to replicas that are not remotely checked out during a remote workflow activity. Valid Values: true - Prevents replicas from being released. false - Allows replicas to be released (have a release status).
